name: Turan
body:
Welcome to Computer Science 101! This is the course developed for Turan Foundation students:
Week DateTopicHW
4614/11/2015What is programming? History of programmingInstall Python 2.7 on computers at home
4721/11/2015Introduction Python: Syntax, Data types & Problem solving tasks1. Codeacademy: Python Syntax part. 2. Create a program that computes the real roots of a quadratic equation.
4828/11/2015Python Practice Task: Solving Simple Arithmetic Problems 
495/12/2015Python Functions & its methodology, conditions (if, else) 
5012/12/2015Loops (for & while loops) 
5119/12/2015Data Stuctures (Lists, Dictionaries) 
5226/12/2015Practicing the finalized material. Final Projects Review!
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
